department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: The purpose of this Call for Proposals EN578-22ISC9 TS5 is to create a pool of conditionally qualified suppliers to supply the given services to the public institutions in Canada, for the duration of the contract.
description: This is a Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) issued by PWGSC for ISED in partnership with Federal Departments. \\\nThe goal of the Call for Proposals EN578-22ISC9 TS5 is \\\\nto create a pool of conditionally qualified suppliers that can address the objectives outlined in the ISED's \\\\
